about_the_game:
You see dead people, but you'd really prefer not to. It's not that you're creeped out or anything. It's more that they're always so excited to meet someone walking the mortal plane who can see them and they always have a long list of corporeal-hands-needing-tasks. And it's no different at the academy. Although this new ghost you just met says he can help you wrestle your inheritance back from your dead-beat dad... so you might just have to play ball this time.

Point and click your way through this classic comedic story game about a clairvoyant student at an elite academy full of ghosts in dorms and skeletons in closets. Discover what Madam Esmeralda has to hide and untether ghosts by completing their unfinished business in the world of the living, whether it be finishing their achievements, helping them get revenge, or righting the wrongs of the past. Make dialog choices to gain favor and stats, collect items, and unlock different paths.

short_description: The fancy-smancy academy your dad dumped you at is chock full of dang ol' ghosts. Great. Guess who they want to sort out their unfinished business? That's right, you, the clairvoyant. Ugh. Point-and-click your way through ghouls and guffaws in this classic story game.
